Unusual process activity involving data.Data: Windows Event ID 4688, Windows Event ID 4663
Unusual process activity involving data.Action: Monitor Windows Event ID 4688 for suspicious process creation patterns. Analyze process relationships (parent-child). Monitor Windows Event ID 4663 for access to sensitive file paths or large volumes of files by unusual processes. Correlate process activity with known collection/archiving tools or scripts. Use descriptive statistics to baseline normal file access volumes and flag significant deviations.

Outbound network connections with unusua.Data: Zeek conn.log, Zeek http.log, Zeek dns.log
Outbound network connections with unusua.Action: Analyze Zeek conn.log and http.log for outbound connections originating from potential target systems. Examine connection sizes, duration, and frequency. Use time series analysis and statistical profiling (e.g., flow size distribution, inter-arrival times) to identify anomalous network flows that may represent encrypted/compressed data exfiltration.
